name: Untitled Star Wars project
summary:
The unnamed project was a story-based, linear adventure game written by former Naughty Dog creative director Amy Hennig. But, after testing the game concept with players and listening to feedback, EA says it needs to pivot the design. 
 
Electronic Arts announced that it is refocusing the Untitled Star Wars project that was in development at Visceral Games, with EA Vancouver taking over with the new direction, assisted by other EA studios. As Visceral Games has been shutdown.
